Name: Large Single-Subject Functional MRI Datasets at 7T
ReferencesAndLinks: Gonzalez-Castillo, Javier, Colin W. Hoy, Daniel A. Handwerker, Vinai Roopchansingh, Souheil J. Inati, Ziad S. Saad, Robert W. Cox, and Peter A. Bandettini. “Task Dependence, Tissue Specificity, and Spatial Distribution of Widespread Activations in Large Single-Subject Functional MRI Datasets at 7T.” Cerebral Cortex 25, no. 12 (December 2015): 4667–77. https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhu148.
